sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ParameterScreenRefQuals</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ParameterScreenRefQuals</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ParameterScreenRefQuals = Class.create();
ParameterScreenRefQuals.prototype = {
    forInputPage: function() {
		if (current.parameter_screen == "")
			return "";
		
		else
			return "parameter_screen=" + current.parameter_screen;
	},

	forSectionPage: function() {
		return this.forInputPage();
	},

    type: 'ParameterScreenRefQuals'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-01 02:17:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3294a076536220100874ddeeff7b122e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ParameterScreenRefQuals</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile Parameter Screen Plugin" source="com.glide.sg.parameter">7d4478a83c31311068bcf327dfe37fc3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3294a076536220100874ddeeff7b122e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-01 02:17:20</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
